dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2613 IH: Communities Before Air Tourism Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Menendez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to require that a voluntary agreement with respect to commercial air tour operations over a national park considers the well-being of communities overflown by aircraft involved in such operations, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Communities Before Air Tourism Act.
Section 40128(b)(7) of title 49, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B) by striking or the air traffic control system and inserting , the air traffic control system, or the well-being of communities overflown by aircraft involved in such commercial air tour operations; and
in subparagraph (C) by inserting any community whose lands are, or may be, and before any Indian tribe.
